attributes.action: We the licence payers deserve to know who is accountable for managing the licence fee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We pay for the bbc, trust, audience councils, ofcom, national audience council and others. Who is accountable to licence payers? Being a long-standing licence payer, I require the name of that person and their contact address that will accept and respond to my views and will not direct me to yet another site. I expect accountability, not diversion.

ron

rejection.details: Your first point of contact should be the BBC.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
